name: StockPip-forex-platform
description: Complete Forex Trading Platform with Admin Dashboard, User App, and Marketing Website

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:websocket"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:admin && npm run build:user
scripts.install:all: cd ../Admin-Dashboard_-Business-Control-Panel-codebase && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../forexuserapp && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../websocket-pack && npm install

author: StockPip
